code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./songNow.css";import AllSongs from"../../redux/allsongs";import{setplaylist,getplaylist}from"../../redux/allplaylists";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SongNow(props){var next=function next(){var gp=getplaylist();if(gp[0]===-1){gp=AllSongs.map(function(e){return e.id;});}var temp=gp.indexOf(props.getsong)+1;if(gp.length<=temp){temp=0;}props.setsong(gp[temp]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"SongNow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:AllSongs[props.getsong].url,className:"picture"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"titles",children:AllSongs[props.getsong].author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"titles",children:AllSongs[props.getsong].name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("audio",{src:AllSongs[props.getsong].previewURL,controls:true,autoplay:"true",style:{width:"98%",minWidth:"220px"},onEnded:next}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){var array=getplaylist();for(var i=array.length-1;i>0;i--){var j=Math.floor(Math.random()*(i+1));var temp=array[i];array[i]=array[j];array[j]=temp;}setplaylist(array);next();},className:"shuffle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev",onClick:function onClick(){var gp=getplaylist();var temp=gp.indexOf(props.getsong)-1;if(0>temp){temp=gp.length-1;}props.setsong(gp[temp]);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next",onClick:function onClick(){next();}})]});}export default SongNow;
